website_summaries.verdict: Simple, effective DVD player that upscales high-definition content.
pros: A well-made DVD player for a decent price
HDMI cable connects to smart TVs or gaming consoles

customer_reviews.title: Disk Kept Ejecting
customer_reviews.text: I'm certainly thankful that Amazon Prime customers get free returns because this DVD player was a real "lemon." The disk kept ejecting over and over again whenever we tried to play it. This product was supposed to be brand new and looked brand new, but I wonder if it was reconditioned. If it was not a reconditioned item (which I took care NOT to order), it was grossly defective. I can't believe other people have given this DVD player such a high rating, but perhaps they eventually found out there was something wrong with it--as I did only a few hours after first use.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Heisler

customer_reviews.title: but the worst part is the remote
customer_reviews.text: This DVD player makes the loudest 'whirring' sounds I've ever heard from a piece of electronic equipment, but the worst part is the remote, which must have been designed by someone who didn't know what a remote control was supposed to do. The buttons are set up in the most illogical, least intuitive way possible. Unless the designer set out to manufacture the world's worst remote control, it's a major failure. A testament to being able to see and touch something prior to buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Stuka

customer_reviews.title: Barely Works
customer_reviews.text: No LED display with the time/place on the DVD. I can't believe a DVD player exists without a display. The remote interferes with my soundbar. The picture is a small square surrounded by a black frame. (Yes, that might be some technical setup issue, but I'm not looking to become an expert.) The buttons on the remote are super tiny, there's like a hundred of them. Even with my glasses I can't see them. It comes with one page of instructions printed too small to read. Let me count the ways this thing sucks. Bye... returning this garbage
customer_reviews.author: Elaineous

customer_reviews.title: Nice upscaling!
customer_reviews.text: Mine worked well right out of the box, you have to turn it on manually the first time (hold the red button down until it turns green) and you'll want to go through setup as well. After setup (had to manually tell it to output 1080p) it seems to work fine. Even the remote works as expected and the upscaling is very good. It is very small & very basic No Clock, No presets or timers just a basic small DVD player. Don't know how long it will last but at this price anything over six months I will count as a win.
customer_reviews.author: Oldwetcat

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy. Ever since I bought it played maybe ...
customer_reviews.text: Not a good buy. Ever since I bought it played maybe two discs with no issues. All the other times, I had to shake, turn, tilt until it recognizes the dvd. For the most part I have to stand it up against the wall to play at all and when it does I can hear the disc spinning across the room. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: MsRich

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed but I guess you get what you pay for . The remote quit working after a month or so, and the player itself randomly freezes (with brand new dvds) Since the remote quit working there is no way to skip or rewind. The only buttons on the front are play, stop, & eject
customer_reviews.author: s.autrey

customer_reviews.title: REMOTE CONTROL IS TOO SMALL
customer_reviews.text: The remote control is too small. My fingers keep hitting the wrong button and I cannot read the labels on each function cause the print is way too small. Need a bigger remote with the unit although I assume the price will go up on the purchase. Also I notice it does not play DVD's that I recorded myself all that well. On many of them the machine freezes and I have to restart several times before it will play and even then sometimes it still won't play. But it plays store bought DVDs okay. All in all not a bad product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Clancy

customer_reviews.title: mine is defective and being returned
customer_reviews.text: I had a hard time installing the Player, but talked to customer service and they talked me thru the reason I had no sound (I had 2 outlets on my TV marked the same, and chose the wrong one). so that problem was fixed. then I played the DVD I purchased from Goodwill and it played. Then I rented Adrift from Redbox and it wouldn't play. Then I rented red Box 's Glass Castles and it played . Then I rented Atomic Blonde and it didn't play. I called customer service and after a long conversation about "flawed DVD's" they agreed to replace the player. so that's where we are in the process... turn in for future developments....
customer_reviews.author: sheree bochenek

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I have lost my mind trying to use the remote to this DVD player. Just God Awful! All buttons tiny tiny tiny and not labeled. I pressed some button and now it only plays in black and white. Can not fast forward. Can not even find which button to push to play. Put up with it for just too long and now have missed the window to return. Into the garbage it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: I revived the wrong cords so I couldn’t even plug it up then the button on the remote are popping out. Not really a fan. All together I feel like this is a cheaply made product.
customer_reviews.author: Nikkie

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this
customer_reviews.text: This DVD player sucks. For 1 it came with no remote. Then we bought a remote to work with it. Remote didnt work for it. Then the picture sucks. This DVD player just plain sucks all around!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Tichenor

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this DVD player to use in the group forum. The DVD I am using has seven sections. The first four played fine, but I could not get it to play anything after that. Unfortunately I am about six weeks from purchase date, so cannot return. In any case I do not recommend it
customer_reviews.author: H Wright

customer_reviews.title: Broken in months
customer_reviews.text: Only owned 2 1/2 months and only use for workout dvds so under 1 hour a day and 5 or 6 times a week. It started freezing anytime it was paused and now it just keeps shutting off on its own as soon as it starts to play. Can't even use it anymore. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work properly
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this DVD player to watch a recently purchased season of a Showtime series. The first disc wouldn’t play the show, only the advertisements at the end, then it would revert to the GPX home screen. The second disc took almost nine minutes to play. I contacted the customer support number provided in the packaging. They had me unplug, hold the power button for 30 seconds and so on... still didn’t work. I’ve already spent more time on this than if I had been able to watch the disc. Returning for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi W.

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect
customer_reviews.text: Finally an affordable DVD player that I can use for my projector that actually works great.
customer_reviews.author: Homeworks Media

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this item.
customer_reviews.text: What an extreme disappointment! Took it out of the box plugged it in and then nothing. Tried for 15 minutes to get dvds to play and it didn't do anything but cause way too much noises for a DVD player. Don't waste your time. I cannot believe Amazon is backing this product.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle M.

customer_reviews.title: Did not work on arrival. Nothing.
customer_reviews.text: Was dead on arrival, nothing. No power, no indicator lights, nothing.
customer_reviews.author: william j bray

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality product overall.
customer_reviews.text: Very discouraged over this product. I had ordered the product, it was not working properly, so I returned it for an exchange(not immediately for a refund, just exchange). I received the replacement one, and it did the same thing as the first one I had and reported to Amazon. I buy several items from Amazon, and usually quite pleased, but this is one poor quality product. Of course, you could say "You get what you pay for", but either way good or bad, it should be a functioning product.
customer_reviews.author: PMH

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work don't waste your time or money
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a Christmas present was just gotten out and tried doesn't work can't return don't waste your money on this crap
customer_reviews.author: timothy boggess

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Only had 10 months and it quit working. Wouldnt even turn on. The motor and disc spinning was too loud right out of the box. I should have returned it right away. Junk. Threw it out. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Ansell

customer_reviews.title: Must have defect machine... when plugged in ...
customer_reviews.text: Must have defect machine...when plugged in, a red light turns on. WILL NOT DO ANYTHING ELSE!! The buttons on it don't work and the remote doesn't work either. Will have to return and find a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Miller

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this player!!
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working within months of use. Only played a total of 3 occasions and now freezes or ejects dvd partway through. Even played a new dvd, just in case. Serious disappointment, Do not buy this player!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Bolderoff

customer_reviews.title: We enjoy it
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I read the reviews and was hesitant because of all the negative ones. But figured we don't watch many DVD's so I'll give it a shot. It's amazing for the little we do watch it. The picture is fine, there's no loud noise, no issue with it only playing when in a certain position. It's perfect for us.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Maureen DePouw

customer_reviews.title: Does dont play pal
customer_reviews.text: Wanted cheap dvd player which could play ntsc and pal. This one claims to but does not play pal. Gives you the option but screen goes black does nothing. Have to push n/p button to reset. Other then its average at best.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Schwarz

customer_reviews.title: Shmeh picture but plays fine
customer_reviews.text: It plays everything I've tried to put in. The remote works fine just be sure it's lined up is all. Picture quality is that I'd expect from a DVD non Blu Ray player.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Dobson

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother, couldn't read it froze up
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Didn't need anything fancy, just something that worked. Every disc I tried including brand new, would get a "DISC ERROR" message or play maybe a minute before freezing and disc error message. Sending back
customer_reviews.author: MajorBrand

customer_reviews.title: Less than year with light use, and it is dead
customer_reviews.text: worked fine the first three months. Now it is already making horrible noises and takes about three minutes to even recognize a dvd. I have done all the right things, including cleaning it, but I am so disappointed in this machine. I also want to explain that I only use this particular machine when the grandkids come over so it does not even get heavy use. I would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: PMGrandma

customer_reviews.title: Remote sucks
customer_reviews.text: The one thing I wish was different is the remote. Its small, and hard to press. Also the remote turns my bluetooth speakers on and off which is weird.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Sweet

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what it said. It was in the box an exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This a VERY simple movie player. It won't cook ...
customer_reviews.text: This a VERY simple movie player. It won't cook dinner or make a late. :-) Plug it into the tv and go. Use an HDMI cable ( I think that's the one) to hook up one cable to one port. Not the old school red, green, white. The controls are so limited that you have to work at it to not run the machine. AND it was under $40, if it didn't work no big loss. Two thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas G

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: Good for the money. It works so far. It does not have HDMI. In all fairness, it never claimed to have HDMI hookups, but these days, most people expect it.
customer_reviews.author: Willie

customer_reviews.title: Good basic DVD player
customer_reviews.text: Good basic DVD player. I've used it for about a dozen Netflix DVD's and haven't run into any problems. My only complaint is that the remote needs to be within approximately 5 feet of player. I don't consider it a deal breaker. The only other "glitch" is that the remote for my sound system triggers the OSD (On Screen Display [i.e. Elapsed Time...Time Remaining]) when I raise or lower the volume. Again, an annoyance, not a problem because I don't change the volume often during the movie.
customer_reviews.author: Maria D>

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy- skips
customer_reviews.text: This was a pretty good dvd until last night. It keeps skipping parts of the movie. I know it is not the actual dvd since we have tried several movies only for the dvd to skip. I would like to return but we threw away the box. We have only had the player for a few weeks and have used about 10x before it stopped working. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a good brand
customer_reviews.text: I usually don’t write reviews but this is not a good product. I purchased the first player and had a difficult time playing discs, screen would freeze and I would have to unplug the player, eject the disc or turn it off to get the player to working again. Requested a replacement and had the same issues. Returned both items. The company was extremely easy to deal with and was prompt with sending the replacement but not a good brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't looking for anything fancy, just something to play some old exercise DVDs in the garage. This was the cheapest one I could find and it works fine for me
customer_reviews.author: C Jones

customer_reviews.title: DVD player
customer_reviews.text: Thank you sooo much for shipping it soo fast. I am very happy with this purchase. Thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Broke in Less Than a Year (Eject Button Doesn’t Work)
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this DVD player for less than a year, used it a only a handful of times, and now it is not working anymore. I cannot open the part where you insert your disc. I’ve tried using the remote it comes with as well as clicking the eject button on the player itself and neither has worked. Frustrating to say the least. I do not recommend this DVD player at all.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Altsman

customer_reviews.title: DVD player does not work
customer_reviews.text: DVD player won't work. I would like a new one. I can't mail it back to you> I don't drive. I am a senior citizen. It does not work to sell to someone else. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: jane doe

customer_reviews.title: Does not have an HDMI port
customer_reviews.text: This is a good little DVD player I was thinking it was a HDMI cord but it’s not And I didn’t go down in the specifics to see if it said if it was or was not though it’s only those red white green and blue chords I don’t know exactly what those cords are called but the picture is still really good the sound is good good buy for the kids playroom
customer_reviews.author: L. Nunez

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Update!!! Called customer service and received call back next day from technician who walked me through how to reset the machine. Push the N/P button on the remote to reset!!! Works great now. Customer service gets 5 stars! First one I bought lasted a week, it's replacement lasted 3 months. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap quality. Broke in less than 1 year of use. Save your money and buy better quality one!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Watching all the old carol burnet shows on this beuty
customer_reviews.text: It was really cheap. but who says cheap things aren't good? I bought this because we were moving and i had shut my cable off, so i bought this lil DVD and shes being playing all kinds of movies for me,, I love it , nothing wrong with it,,, i would be another one just like it,she's a dandy.
customer_reviews.author: Keith and patricia montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: Sporadically plays dvds. Unacceptable load times. Gave up trying to watch movies on it and plugged my computer in.
customer_reviews.author: Buckles6

customer_reviews.title: ... used it yet it's for Christmas but it looks beautiful and clean and well packaged
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet it's for Christmas but it looks beautiful and clean and well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha McCord

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible! We used it maybe 5 times and it stopped working. The door won't open and the motor keeps running and running trying to open and close the door but nothing happens.
customer_reviews.author: emily c.

customer_reviews.title: like half way through
customer_reviews.text: The player doesn't always work properly. At times it will display the movie pixelated, like half way through. Particularly, it does not like brand new movies. I've had more problems with first showing (fresh out of the package), than others on my shelf.
customer_reviews.author: A. Janisch

customer_reviews.title: Lasted almost a year then broke
customer_reviews.text: This DVD player worked great until about 6 months after purchasing it, it started having issues. It wasn't used super often so I believe the product itself is to blame. It had trouble turning on and off about 6 months in, then finally died at 10 months. Disappointed and now shopping for a new DVD player.
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: I am so disappointed in this product
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed in this product. Just took it out of the box and got it all set up only to the DVD tray open but not close.
customer_reviews.author: Genes

customer_reviews.title: Poor item so disappointed in it
customer_reviews.text: Cables were missing that hooks it up to a smart tv cant watch color tv because the hdmi cable was not included with the DVD player
customer_reviews.author: virginia crabtree

customer_reviews.title: tough unit!
customer_reviews.text: we bought this for our monkey to watch movies. It has been working fine for over a year now and has to operate in tough conditions. The first one to last this long. Update: It just broke. I shouldn't have written this review.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Good Player
customer_reviews.text: The DVD player works great, but, I can't raise or lower the volume 🔊.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J. Quinn, Sr

customer_reviews.title: This dvd player is junk!
customer_reviews.text: This dvd player only worked for a couple weeks! Can't returned because the box accidentally got thrown away. When it did work it was fine. After it would scramble up the picture even on brand new out of the package movies. Save your money and find something different!
customer_reviews.author: Anna M Smith

customer_reviews.title: Just didn't work!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like it because it worked about a week and then stopped.
customer_reviews.author: Riverview Realtor

customer_reviews.title: Quality and it lacks it! Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Makes a loud humming noise, remote works when it wants too, would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Angelina Morales

customer_reviews.title: nice and easy to use.  For the money 5 stars.
customer_reviews.text: Great for occasional movie watchers who still watch DVD. Easy set up easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: John smith

customer_reviews.title: Not a good deal
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the $. Just bought a couple of months ago and it is acting up. Fast forward and rewind takes u so far back instead of a little at a time. Also had trouble getting it to turn off!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for just watching DVDs
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something cheap to put in our living room just to watch movies. Machine works great. One down side is that it is supposed to be able to play CDs that are writable, but it does not.....kind of disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up. The only thing I didn't like was the lettering and numbers on the remote were very small
customer_reviews.author: bjh

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to use.
customer_reviews.text: Awful. You can hear the dvd turning very loudly. Impossible to use. To much trouble to return.
customer_reviews.author: Luciana V

customer_reviews.title: Great except the remote
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I wanted for my daughter everything works perfectly except for the remote it takes a few tries to get it to work however my daughter lost it 2 days into having it so i guess ill have to find a replacement. Anyone know where i can get just the remote.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: Worked for 5 months. Motor is out. Won’t spin a disk
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Work :-(
customer_reviews.text: We watched one dvd with no problem, and then the second dvd we tried would not play. It was brand new! We had “invalid key” message come up. So we watched half of a movie then we couldn’t finish it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessesgrl

customer_reviews.title: good picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Plays well, good picture quality, but the controls are couterintuitive (yes, I've read the instructions).
customer_reviews.author: Mugsie

customer_reviews.title: Player DVD
customer_reviews.text: great DVD player for the price works really well and has a great picture and the remotes Easy-to-Read just so nice little DVD
customer_reviews.author: dcm123

customer_reviews.title: Good for a secondary player
customer_reviews.text: No HDMI out so you have to use the component cables. Picture quality suffers. I put this in my rec room for watching workout videos, so it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: PluralTurtle

customer_reviews.title: Good Item. Horrible Delivery.
customer_reviews.text: Item works well but delivery was not acceptable. Took 10+ days longer than the estimated delivery date to receive the item.
customer_reviews.author: Elle Cherny

customer_reviews.title: This unit is terrible!
customer_reviews.text: This unit is terrible! It worked for 1 movie, then stopped. Every time I try to play a video, it takes me through the menu loop and never plays. It turns on spontaneously and makes strange noises. Now I have to trash/recycle a brand new item. Goodbye $...what a waste!
customer_reviews.author: Larry Schmidt`

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Did the job for our 8 yr old to watch frozen over and over again lol
customer_reviews.author: Darlene LaValle

customer_reviews.title: Short life span
customer_reviews.text: Good picture quality, when it worked. Door broke after 2 uses.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Brown

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Great little DVD player, perfect for watching movies with my Grandkids. Glad I found this on Amazon. No complicated connections to figure out ant the price was very right. I would recommend this to anyone who just wants to watch movies without all the fuss.
customer_reviews.author: S. DAY

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Piece of crap. The remote signal is weak and the buttons are so small. The the labeling is so small you can’t even read it.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew W Nuckolls

customer_reviews.title: Movies freezing up frequently!
customer_reviews.text: This has been the 3rd time in a month that a movie being played just freezes up! I thought it was the DVD itself, but now I'm thinking it's the player! Wish I'd seen this before my return window closed, now I'm stuck. You really get what you pay for! Buyer beware...
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Alford

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price! Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my bedroom. Came with instructions to set up!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsie

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Dvd player does not work, plays 2-25 minutes when you get it to turn on, then power shuts off while playing.
customer_reviews.author: David Vanatta

customer_reviews.title: get out the popcorn!
customer_reviews.text: Very simple to connect! Up and showing movies right away. Nice remote. Very compact. It's a winner!
customer_reviews.author: udell

customer_reviews.title: Good cheap dvd player
customer_reviews.text: Turns on randomly on it's own, but works as designed.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Schimanski

customer_reviews.title: You Get What You Pay For
customer_reviews.text: My biggest complaint is the high pitch whine the motor makes. Its not incredible loud but noticeable when it's on.
customer_reviews.author: Furyus01

customer_reviews.title: Holds up well
customer_reviews.text: Got it for a chirstmas present for an uncle. He has had it for 3 years. Everything is still working well!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DOA - used
customer_reviews.text: dead on arrival. It looked like it was previously owned. So I may have gotten some else's returned product. The product it self may work wonderfully, I just got a used defective one even-though I ordered new.
customer_reviews.author: PN

customer_reviews.title: This DVD is perfect..
customer_reviews.text: This DVD is perfect... Inexpensive & it works! what more can you want from a DVD? this is the second one I have. Bought the first one last year around Christmas time at Target, this price was about the same, and wanted another DVD player for another T.V.
customer_reviews.author: L. Plough

customer_reviews.title: Remote never worked
customer_reviews.text: The remote never worked I was never able to use the DVD player
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too few people have dvd players. I'm trying to fix it.
customer_reviews.text: I'm going to need a few more... love this product.
customer_reviews.author: WaWa

customer_reviews.title: Immediate death
customer_reviews.text: After 1-1/2 hours this DVD player stopped working and swallowed my DVD. I powered it off and it never came back in again. Total junk despite the bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer O.

customer_reviews.title: Needed fast bought cheap refretted it 2months later....it broke
customer_reviews.text: Worked for two months then wouldn't play brand new DVDs without a scratch on them my husband and I threw it away and bought a Sony. If u can't afford a more expensive DVD or BLU RAY player don't buy this one go to ur local pawn shop or walmart even has been quality ones that last longer for the same price
customer_reviews.author: britneyyyh.

customer_reviews.title: 30 days and dead
customer_reviews.text: On the 30th day when I couldn't return it, it stopped turning on. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Horrible !!️!!️
customer_reviews.text: once you getting into the first hour of your movie , DVD player freezes up . It will not let you skip a scene without freezing up as well . HORRIBLE QUALITY ILL NEVER PURCHASE THIS BRAND AGAIN !!️!!️!!️
customer_reviews.author: Jaqutia Patton

customer_reviews.title: Good Basic CD-DVD Player
customer_reviews.text: Good basic CD-DVD player. Bought to replace an identical player which failed in our RV. Simple replacement unplug the old, plug-in the new... and it works. KISSS: keep it simple for sanity sake.
customer_reviews.author: Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Buy at your own risk
customer_reviews.text: My product came without the cords or remote. Tried to give zero stars but couldn't.
customer_reviews.author: Fefelamour

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't actually play all regions
customer_reviews.text: It works ok but doesn't play all regions. Can't get it to play most region 2 DVDs.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: GPX D200B DVD player
customer_reviews.text: This is a basic DVD player, does not cost much, easy to use. I bought it for my mother who likes to get DVD's from the library. Very small and compact. It also came with a audio/video cord! Remote control also.
customer_reviews.author: Meggie

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: The dvd player will skip and freeze on dvds that are brand new with no scratches. I wish i would have tried it outbefore the return date
customer_reviews.author: morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a regular DVD player, and I was skepticalbecause of previous reviews. Its silent. Pretty smooth for under 25$. I would definitely recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Lae

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I liked the design but the remote never would work right and movie's kept freezing up and skipping.... returned the item
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Rice

customer_reviews.title: Both GPX players work great, but only 1 of the Craig's worked
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these and 2 Craig brand. Both GPX players work great, but only 1 of the Craig's worked. I would purchase these again. Only use when at camp, so no need for expensive players.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen E. Conley

customer_reviews.title: Sucks
customer_reviews.text: This dvd player sucks royally. It'll play a movie and half way through the movie it stops. All my dvds are clean, not a scratch. This is a piece of sh*+.
customer_reviews.author: Joey M.

customer_reviews.title: Clear picture and sound
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth buying, it’s not expensive and works so well. Doesn’t make a sound while playing the dvd, picture quality is clear. Highly recommend this DVD player
customer_reviews.author: Meghan hervey

customer_reviews.title: Just bought it
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I hope it lasts a long time. I'll get back if there are any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Ed

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. easy to set up. No problems what so ever. Great price. I would recommend this dvd player.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Smart

customer_reviews.title: Zero stars!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Zero stars!!! This DVD player DOES NOT work!!! I put in a DVD and it made a loud clunking noise and would not read the disk, and the disk was brand new!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: If player is set to repeat it shows on the tv screen all the time. And it's a bit loud when dvd is spinning
customer_reviews.author: Le D

product_meta.title: GPX DH300B 1080p Upconversion DVD Player with HDMI
product_meta.description: Style:1080p Upconversion HDMIGive your HDTV what it deserves-a DVD player capable of dishing out high-definition resolutions. HDMI makes it possible to watch your current DVDs in HD resolution. You can choose the best resolution to match your HDTV - 720p, 1080i, or 1080p. The GPX DH300B DVD player supports DVD, DVD+-R/RW formats as well as CD, CD-R/RW, and JPEG CDs. It supports 720p, 1080i, 1080p and aspect ratios of 16:9, 4:3LB, or 4.3PS. It is Dolby Digital Ready with the 2 channel stereo sound. Each drawer-load DVD player has outputs for HDMI, S-video, composite video, coaxial digital audio and RCA stereo audio. The multi-language on-screen display lets you adjust video and audio settings with the included full-function remote. Included in the box are the DVD player with a built-in AC power cable, remote control (requires 2 AAA batteries - not included), RCA audio/video cable, warranty card and a user's guide. For more than 30 years, GPX has offered one of the broadest portfolios of technology-driven consumer audio and video products. An award-winning consumer electronics company, GPX has built a solid reputation on excellent product quality, reliability, design, and affordability.
feature_bullets: Has output for HDMI, S-video, composite video, coaxial digital audio and RCA stereo audio
Full-function remote included (requires 2 AAA batteries - not included)
